content.text:
# Draft:Knights Award (Malaysia)

The Knight Awards (not to be confused with knighthood or the title of Knight) is a recognition ceremony held in Malaysia that honors outstanding entrepreneurs, business leaders, and companies across various industries in Asia.
Each category includes separate recognition for both individual achievements and corporate accomplishments.
The awards have gained recognition beyond Malaysia, with the presence of many more international and national business leaders, celebrities, key opinion leaders and other significant stakeholders.
Notable Recipients
* Tan Sri Dato' Seri Dr. Haji Noor Hisham Abdullah
* Prof Wang Gung Wu
* Dato' Sri Hajah Siti Nurhaliza
* Datuk Nicol David
* Dato' Seri A. Samad Said
* Dato' Dr Sheikh Muszaphar
* Law Lan
* Daniel Powter
* Marcelito Pomoy
